query:
SELECT 
  'Mercados' as entidade,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(createdAt) = '2025-11-19' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as criados_no_run,
  SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(createdAt) = '2025-10-21' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as originais
FROM mercados_unicos
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Concorrentes' as entidade,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(createdAt) = '2025-11-19' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as criados_no_run,
  SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(createdAt) = '2025-10-21' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as originais
FROM concorrentes
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Leads' as entidade,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(createdAt) = '2025-11-19' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as criados_no_run,
  SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(createdAt) = '2025-10-21' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as originais
FROM leads;
